item.title: CSS Flexbox Tutorial for Beginners
item.dc:creator: wpadmin
item.content:encoded:
[student] You are enrolled in this course [/student]

Course Description

This is an example of a free course demonstrating some of the core LearnDash functionality. Key concepts covered include:
  • Accepted media files
  • Example quiz questions
  • Timer demonstration
  • Badges & Points demonstration
  • Available shortcodes
Advanced functionality such as learner engagement notifications, assignments, essay questions (and more) are not featured in this course. Please contact us if you have any questions relating to any of the LearnDash features.

item.title: Learn JavaScript – Full Course for Beginners
item.dc:creator: wpadmin
item.content:encoded:
[student]You are enrolled in this course[/student]

Course Description

This is an example of paid course and includes a sample lesson.  LearnDash supports seven different ways to sell courses:
  1. PayPal
  2. Stripe
  3. 2Checkout
  4. Shopping Cart (WooCommerce, Easy Digital Downloads, Exchange, Jigoshop)
  5. Membership plugin (PaidMembershipsPro, MemberPress, Memberium, iMember360)
  6. EventEspresso
  7. GravityForms
Key features demonstrated in this course include:
  • Purchase process for a course using PayPal or Stripe options
  • Articulate Storyline example
  • Sample Lesson feature

item.title: Teaching Children English Online Course

item.content:encoded:
[student]You are enrolled in this course[/student]

Course Description

This is an example of paid course and includes a sample lesson.  LearnDash supports seven different ways to sell courses:
  1. PayPal
  2. Stripe
  3. 2Checkout
  4. Shopping Cart (WooCommerce, Easy Digital Downloads, Exchange, Jigoshop)
  5. Membership plugin (PaidMembershipsPro, MemberPress, Memberium, iMember360)
  6. EventEspresso
  7. GravityForms
Key features demonstrated in this course include:
  • Purchase process for a course using PayPal or Stripe options
  • Articulate Storyline example
  • Sample Lesson feature
